class.name: InteractiveGrid3D
class.brief_description: InteractiveGrid3D is a Node3D that allows player interaction with a 3D grid. It can be used for cell selection, pathfinding, and hover highlights.
class.description: - Select individual cells. - Detect obstacles (collision mask configurable from the editor). - Align cells with the floor (collision mask configurable from the editor). - Hide distant cells to focus on the relevant area. - Calculate paths from a global position to selected cells using AStar2D. - Choose movement type: 4 directions, 6 directions, 8 directions, directly from the editor. - Customize the grid from the editor: grid size, cell size, mesh, colors, and shaders. - High performance using MultiMeshInstance3D for efficient rendering of multiple cells.

method.name: add_custom_cell_data
method.description: Adds custom data to a specific cell. - Applies the associated layer mask to the cell. - If a custom color is defined, it is applied to the cell.

method.name: center
method.description: Centers the grid around the given global position and rebuilds its layout. This operation repositions all cells, realigns them with the environment, rescans obstacles and custom data, and refreshes A* navigation.

method.name: clear_all_custom_cell_data
method.description: Resets the cell's custom_flags and removes any custom_color.

method.name: clear_custom_cell_data
method.description: Resets the custom data of a given cell.

method.name: compute_unreachable_cells
method.description: Iterates over all grid cells and marks as unreachable those cells that cannot be reached from the specified start_cell. Updates the visual representation by applying unreachable_color to the cells.

method.name: get_cell_global_position
method.description: Returns the global_position of the cell identified by index.

method.name: get_cell_index_from_global_position
method.description: Returns the index of the grid cell that is closest to the supplied world position.

method.name: get_grid_center_global_position
method.description: Returns the global_position of the interactive grid.

method.name: get_latest_selected
method.description: Returns the most recently selected_cell.

method.name: get_neighbors
method.description: Returns the indices of neighboring cells for the specified grid cell.

method.name: get_path
method.description: Computes a path between two cells on the grid using A* pathfinding.

method.name: get_selected_cells
method.description: Returns an array of all cells currently marked as selected.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns the total number of cells in the grid.

method.name: has_custom_cell_data
method.description: Checks if a specific cell has the given CustomCellData applied. Returns true if the cell's flags include the full layer mask of the specified CustomCellData, otherwise returns false.

method.name: hide_distant_cells
method.description: Iterates over all grid cells and hides those located farther than the specified distance from the start_cell. Marks them as unwalkable.

method.name: highlight_on_hover
method.description: Updates the hover highlight state based on the specified global_position. Identifies the corresponding cell, clears any previous hover, and applies the hover color unless the cell is already selected.

method.name: highlight_path
method.description: Updates the hover highlight state based on the specified global_position. Identifies the corresponding cell, clears any previous hover, and applies the hover color unless the cell is already selected.

method.name: is_cell_hovered
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as hovered.

method.name: is_cell_reachable
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as unreachable.

method.name: is_cell_selected
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as selected.

method.name: is_cell_visible
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as visible.

method.name: is_cell_walkable
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as walkable.

method.name: is_grid_created
method.description: Checks if the grid has been created.

method.name: is_hover_enabled
method.description: Checks whether hover functionality is currently disabled.

method.name: reset_cells_state
method.description: Clears all CustomCellData, resets cell_flags.

method.name: select_cell
method.description: Selects a grid cell based on a global_position.

method.name: set_cell_color
method.description: Sets the color of a specific cell.

method.name: set_cell_reachable
method.description: Sets whether a given grid cell is unreachable.

method.name: set_cell_walkable
method.description: Sets whether a specific cell is walkable or not.

method.name: set_hover_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables hover functionality.

method.name: update_custom_data
method.description: Refreshes custom_cell_flags, colors, and A* configuration based on the current CellCustomData.
